ignore-defense.label: Ignores Defense
ignore-defense.desc: These characters have an inherent effect that ignores part of the target's Defense. It can come from skills, Exclusive Equipment, or Transcendence upgrades.

premium.label: Premium Units
premium.desc: These characters can only be obtained through special events or Premium banners.

limited.label: Limited Units
limited.desc: These characters are time-limited and only available during specific banners.

seasonal.label: Seasonal Units
seasonal.desc: These characters are limited and tied to seasonal events like Halloween or Christmas.

collab.label: Collab Units
collab.desc: These characters are limited to crossovers events with other franchises. They are the least likely to return.
